remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class (closed form of ~ csbie2 ).  (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
csbie2t.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
csbie2t.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
csbie2t $p |- ( A. x A. y ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> C = D ) -> [_ A / x ]_ [_ B / y ]_ C = D ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d D x y $.
